name: codetether-chat
description: VS Code chat participant that persists chat sessions to CodeTether.

chatParticipants.name: CodeTether
chatParticipants.description: Chat via VS Code LM and upload transcripts to CodeTether sessions.

codetether.apiUrl.description: Base URL of your CodeTether server (e.g. http://localhost:8000).

codetether.apiToken.description: Optional Bearer token (matches a token value from A2A_AUTH_TOKENS).

codetether.codebaseId.description: Optional override for the CodeTether codebase_id to associate sessions with.
